title: The Loose Lip Brigade
description: BUY IT AT 20% OFF!http://tinyurl.com/b75b7nrHave you ever tangoed with your own demons? Struggled to suppress an impulse while shrinking from desire? Escape into the insightful, resonating pages of this short story collection.Each character in The Loose Lip Brigade is as human and fallible as we are. They are paralyzed by the reality of their circumstance. Within these moments of anxiety, the collection explores themes of self-doubt and self-indulgence, unveiling the nature of intimacy and the sometimes un-gratifying consequences of acting on whim. There is raw vulnerability on every page, yet enough hope and grace to leave us satisfied.In seven linked and stand-alone stories, The Loose Lip Brigade will hook you.In ‘The Hurly Burly,’ teenaged Ramona obsesses over a boy with an overwhelming urgency. In ‘Bread Crumbs,’ Samantha’s search for her runaway dog exposes familiar wounds from her past with the sharp pain of enlightened grief. Plus 5 more juicy tales!
author: Julia Newman
